english_translation: Narrated by Abdullah ibn Masud: When one of you raises his head from the prostration before the imam, then he prostrates the second (prostration), he should wait an amount equal to the time in which he raised his head.

english_translation: Narrated by al-Akhnas (Bukayr's father) who said: While I was sitting with Abdullah ibn Masud, a man came to him and asked him about a man who commits adultery with a woman then marries her.
